text: Release dedicated to VIDEOCONFERENCING, enabling this long-awaited feature across all devices -- secured by app-to-app encryption -- up to 25 Participants on Web, Desktop, and Mobile (the Mobile app is coming soon).

Video Group Calls: lots of improvements such as Start/Stop screen sharing while call is minimised, improved Pin/Unpin, updated Participants order, mic muted by default, call duration indication on ended calls, new animations,...
Bug Fixes & Other Improvements: General fixes for improved User Experience.
